# Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act 1996, USA (HIPAA)

## Key Clauses
- **§164.312:** Technical safeguards
- **§164.502:** Uses/disclosures

## iLuminara Relevance
- Encrypted audit trail; breach simulation
- Amplifies 21 CFR Part 11 integrity → clinical validation

## Amplification Synergy
- Amplifies: HITECH, FDA 21 CFR Part 11

## Data-Driven Law Proposal
- If >90% prevention efficacy, propose stricter technical safeguard requirements
